Detailed Description

An entity represent data that will be put in content field during request.

This is the base interface of entity, implement HttpEntity to provide data in an HTTP request.

It groups entities that based on file and one that based on byte stream. File-based shouldn't be treated as a normal byte stream-based entity, as the procedure of transformming from a file to a buffer needs one more data copy, and a file can be bigger than a normal byte buffer. It's better if file is handled directly by network backend.

Definition at line 29 of file HttpEntity.h.
